website_summaries.verdict: These premium eye drops are fast-acting and provide long-lasting relief for itchy eyes.
pros: Temporarily alleviate eye irritation due to animal hair, pollen, and other allergens
Can be used by both adults and children age 3 and older
Contains an antihistamine to deliver safe and effective results
A single application delivers up to 12 hours of itchy eye relief
Easy to use the eye drops at your convenience
cons: Pricey in contrast to other eye drops

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE REAL EYE DROPS!
customer_reviews.text: These are not the real Zaditor drops. I use Zaditor drops daily and when I tried these drops they made my eyes burn and left them red for over 24 hours. They also made my eyes itchier than before I used the drops, they were very irritating to my eyes. I went to CVS and purchased the real deal, no itching or burning.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Great product as a great price
customer_reviews.text: My optometrist recommended this product after he noticed allergy bumps under my eyelids were likely causing red eye issues. The dry, likely dirty air in my office would leave my eyes red and irritated by the end of the day. Using this product twice a day (then down to once a day) has helped immensely. Use at least 15 minutes before putting in your contacts to give the product a chance to work. Can't beat Amazon's pricing on this product. Very convenient 2-bottle pack.
customer_reviews.author: James Forte

customer_reviews.title: Zaditor or Ketotifen Fumarate...
customer_reviews.text: Whichever you use it is amazing for the itchy red eyes of allergies. I am mainly allergic to grass pollen (the wild prairie types) which peak in the late spring. My eyes used to itch horribly regardless of any other allergy medication (prescription or OTC) I was taking. My sister told me about Ketotifen Fumarate and my eyes have been blessed since. I notice no difference between the Zaditor or the generic Ketotifen Fumarate except the price and bottle size. When comparing the price check the size of the bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Nostabo

customer_reviews.title: Best over the counter eye drop?
customer_reviews.text: Great product!. My doctor recommended this over the counter remedy a few years ago, since I suffer from pollen allergies. It's ideal for mild attacks, and I observe no after effects. its relatively higher price for this category of drug, in my opinion, is justified.
customer_reviews.author: AVgrayb12

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful for seasonal allergies!
customer_reviews.text: These eye drops are the best we have found to help with seasonal allergy issues. Our family has a tough time in the spring. Itchy, watery, red eyes are very common in March-May. These were recommended by our doctor and we were very pleased with the results. They do sting a bit when initially placing the drops, but that is short lived (a couple seconds at most) and it quickly then resolves the other ailments of itchy, watery and red eyes. The box only allows these to be put in twice a day and it will wear off close to the next time for drops, but still provides so much relief. We have been long time users and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jenjais

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly effective relief from eye itchiness
customer_reviews.text: For years I've used prescription eye drops to control allergic itchiness. This year my symptoms overwhelmed the meds so I decided to supplement them with Zaditor over the counter drops. They work incredibly well, even to the extent that I've now stopped the prescription drops and get complete relief from the Zaditor drops. Zaditor is a pretty awkward product name, but the product itself is very effective and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Eclectic Reader

customer_reviews.title: No huge pupils!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Instantly stops the itching and irritation, without causing my pupils to change sizes like other allergy drops do. It's a rare reaction, but allergy drops like Visine-A cause my pupils to enlarge which can be uncomfortable. These don't and they work great!
customer_reviews.author: C. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Effective Relief
customer_reviews.text: These are my go-to eye drops during allergy season and for the inevitable flare-ups throughout the year. I also use them for dry, irritated eyes due to prolonged contact wear and overexposure to electronic screens. When my eyes become extremely dry, itchy, and red, these are the only eye drops that work. My eyes are back to normal almost immediately after use. I highly recommend them to anyone with itchy and red eyes, regardless of whether you have allergies or not.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Bella

customer_reviews.title: RX from my eye doctor
customer_reviews.text: I have had problems with my eyes for the previous years, but my Dr. prescribed these drops morning and night. I've taken them for a year now and it is incredible what a difference they make with zero side affects I can tell. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Chantaclair

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: These twin-packs are extremely convenient. I am allergic to my cat so I buy these twin packs and stash them all over the house - one in the bathroom, one in the nightstand, one in the purse, one in the kitchen. They work better than the prescription drops I was given and area much cheaper also.
customer_reviews.author: BTStarz

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work
customer_reviews.text: Applied it when it arrived and by the way it was a day early..and worked to sooth the itching and watery eyes, but after about 4 hours feel like more is needed, watery again... Some say it takes a day or so to get the full effect, we'll see..
customer_reviews.author: Peter Melious

customer_reviews.title: Very good for allergies (cedar)
customer_reviews.text: I thought that I had dry eye for many years because a doctor told me so... but I was wondering why the dry eye drops never really worked. I finally came to a realization that I had allergies, allergies to cedar more specifically. My neighbors have two huge cedar trees that I can do nothing about, anyways these drops really help!! One drop in each eye morning and night and I am doing better than I have in years, thanks for making this I only wish I had found them sooner!
customer_reviews.author: M. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: Using this for years to combat itchy/watery eyes especially during Spring/Summer. However, make sure it says “Systane” on the box. Also, this is the best price I have found and that includes grocery stores, CVS, Walgreens and WalMart. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: My primary care physician noticed how bad my eyes were suffering from allergies
customer_reviews.text: Burns a little bit, but works wonders once you get used to it. My primary care physician noticed how bad my eyes were suffering from allergies. Not long after at an eye exam, my optometrist recommended this for my seasonal allergies. Most of the redness and swelling is now under control.
customer_reviews.author: WH

customer_reviews.title: My eye symptums are more the burning type and can really ruin a good day. These eye drops keep me going
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is very effective for eye allergies and can help in some other eye conditions such as occular rosaces, etc. because it has mast cell stabelizer. My eye symptums are more the burning type and can really ruin a good day. These eye drops keep me going!
customer_reviews.author: James N. Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Best eye drops
customer_reviews.text: These are such great eye drops. The pharmacist recommended these a few years ago and have made such a difference compared to any other Rx or OTC. Initially, stings with 1st drop, then soothes eye in few seconds. By far, the best eye drops on the market for any season or cause of minor eye irritations. Tried many products for seasonal allergies both Rx and OTC. Also, used for other minor eye irritations. Hands down, no comparison with the relief from these drops. Always ask your pharmacist, they know their products. Can save a few dollars buying (2) pk online. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Hans A.

customer_reviews.title: Gamechanger in Allergy Fight
customer_reviews.text: Super allergic to trees & grass, just call me nature girl. My eyes burn, get itchy, watery, and feel like there's an eyelash stuck or something. These drops fix all of that pretty quickly. I hate using eye drops (I'm a big baby), but the relief these provide is worth dripping liquid onto my eyeballs. I use as needed, sometimes once a day is enough even though safe to use twice daily.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie

customer_reviews.title: Twin pack is nice
customer_reviews.text: Things that work are expensive. Tried the generic brand but to me doesn’t quite seem the same as the real McCoy
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Prevents eye itch, hives, and swollen eyes from cat and pollen allergies - the best OTC eye itch treatment
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best OTC eye itch medicine. With an 80/20 Paleo diet by cutting out all dairy and wheat my allergies are pretty much gone. I no longer sneeze and have no sinus pain to speak of....however my eyes itch in the Spring and when exposed to cats - and we have a cat! She's part of the family so we keep her but I definitely make sure to keep Zadiator drops around. One treatment and the itch goes away. I get hives around my eyes if I cave in and itch or rub them and Zadiator seems to prevent the hives too.
customer_reviews.author: Zebra_Bell7524

customer_reviews.title: work great but price gone up 20 percent in past 6 months
customer_reviews.text: For some ppl like my wife the generic version of this doesn't seem to work as well. But the name brand version Zaditor works great. Unfortunately the price has gone up by twenty percent in just 6 months. Not sure if this is such a good deal anymore here on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Barris

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry eyes
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for my very dry eyes. I have allergy issues and my eye dr. recommended I use Zaditor. This is the 4th time purchasing. Make sure you wait 15 to 20 minutes to put your contacts in if you use. You aren't supposed to use while wearing contacts! Only before putting them in and after taking out.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Schoger

customer_reviews.title: These eyedrops work better than any other allergy eye drop!
customer_reviews.text: My ophthalmologist recommended these. I have severe allergies along with very dry eyes. It's spring, so I end up using these quite a bit. This is definitely a great price for the name brand; less than paying for rmthe generic at the drugstore.
customer_reviews.author: L Kay

customer_reviews.title: Can’t live without it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best over the counter eye drops for allergies. Can’t live without it! Used to want to claw my eyes out during oak pollen season and one drop in each eye completely took away the itching.
customer_reviews.author: Monika G

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry, itchy allergy eyes
customer_reviews.text: I am a diehard contact wearer, which sucks when your eyes are red & itchy. I've tried other drops in the past, but hate having to reapply multiple times throughout the day for relief. It really messes up the eye makeup, and quite frankly, I'm too lazy to do it. These drops were recommended by my optometrist for my dry, red allergy eyes, and they have worked wonders! One drop in each eye in the morning & evening, and my eyes feel great all day! And the online price for the two-pack is much better than any price I've found anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: DezynerMama

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works -- every time! ...
customer_reviews.text: Ugh!! It's allergy season in the Pacific NW for those of us allergic to evergreen pollen. Sneezing, wheezing, and, for me, itchy and watery eyes. I've tried several different allergy eye drops, and I keep coming back to Zaditor. I first tried this when it was prescription-only, and it really does work the best for me. Later in the year, it's leaf mold in the fall and again I turn to Zaditor. Two drops in each eye, and I'm good for at least 8 hours. It doesn't cause dry-eye -- a problem with other allergy drops. Really, I will not purchase anything but Zaditor -- it works the best for me with no side effects. Huge thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: L. MountfordTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: My eye allergies are terrible to the point of not even being able to function/see/drive. This antihistamine stops the itching for a good 6-8 hours for me which is fabulous--but only one drop allowed per eye per 24 hours. (I am outside all day though.) Great drops...doesn't even burn. Will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Pandabear

customer_reviews.title: works very well

It works 12 hours, which is all I needed it for, plus it's intended for people like me who were using eye drops many times a day. Although a bit pricey, my eyes appreciate it.

customer_reviews.title: These are the best allergy eye drops out there
customer_reviews.text: These are the best allergy eye drops out there. I keep a bottle handy for when the pollen gets the best of me. It stops the reaction very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L.Top Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: My eyes get really itchy some times and nothing helps but this. Zaditor doesn't burn my eyes like some of the other eye drops I've tried. Although it's more expensive than the other ones, it's so worth the price. These little bottles also last quite awhile - maybe a month or so.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Worst Ever
customer_reviews.text: Are these a joke? Like a placebo of some sort? What a total and complete waste of money. Avoid this folks ~ save your money!
customer_reviews.author: 4fuxsake

customer_reviews.title: Great for allergies
customer_reviews.text: worked great for my eye allergies even if you wear contacts just use drops 15 minutes prior to putting in your contacts and you are good to go.

customer_reviews.title: Relieve for itchy eyes due to allergies
customer_reviews.text: This used to require a prescription. These drops provide relieve from itchy eyes when conditions are unfavorable for my allergies.

customer_reviews.title: Great product ! Very happy. Great price
customer_reviews.text: Finally! After three eye doctors the last one told me to get this for dry eyes and I can't wait to put it in each day it feels great! 'My eyes feel better. Best price around.

customer_reviews.text: I use every day and it has eliminated my burning, itching eye irritation.

customer_reviews.title: Must have product with allergies

customer_reviews.title: Less Expensive Online
customer_reviews.text: Great price & seems to be getting harder to find in the store. These eye drops do not burn like the store brand. Glad to have found them in a double pack online.

customer_reviews.text: Overpriced drops that are a BIG fail. I will stick with my Opcon-A drops which work Very well on my allergy itchy Eyes.

customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended these drops because I have very dry and itchy eyes. She said I have allergies. These take that itch away. I use them morning and night.

product_meta.title: ALCON Antihistamine Eye Drops, Twin Pack, 5-mL Each
feature_bullets: The first over-the-counter eye drops that temporarily relieves itchy eyes for up to 12 hours with just one drop.
Original prescription-strength formula doesn’t use a vasoconstrictor
Safe and effective for children aged 3 years and older*.
